EmailTemplate.description: For use to shuttle operators when their vehicle registration is 30 days from expiration.
EmailTemplate.name: Vehicle Registration Pending Expiration
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Vehicle Registration Will Expire in 30 Days
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
The registration of vehicle with license plate {!Vehicle__c.License_Plate__c} will expire in 30 days. Please make a note of it and submit a new registration at your earliest convenience by logging in using the link below.
{!Vehicle__c.Link}
Thank you.
Sincerely,
The San Francisco Municipal Transportation Agency
